vote.title: An ordinance amending Chapter 32, “Parks and Water Reservoirs,” of the Dallas City Code by amending Article IV, “White Rock Lake and Bachman Lake Reservoirs”; (1) providing that the Director of Park & Recreation has jurisdiction over White Rock Lake and Bachman Lake; (2) providing regulations for watercraft allowed on the lakes; (3) providing a penalty not to exceed $500.00; (4) providing a saving clause; (5) providing a severability clause; and (6) providing an effective date - Financing: No cost consideration to the City
